models.agent: A running instance of the OpenClaw AI assistant with status, connections, skills, and activity history.
models.connection: A linked external service or chat app through which the agent communicates.
models.skill: A plugin or integration that extends an agent's capabilities.
models.activityEvent: A single event in an agent's activity log — task completion, message sent, memory saved, etc.
models.agentStats: Aggregated metrics for an agent including uptime, token usage, and task counts.

relationships: Each agent has one agentStats summary
